projects.title: Roles Search
projects.description: Led the implementation of the tool's backend using NestJS framework, which included data collection, analysis, and scoring algorithms. Collaborated with frontend developers to integrate the backend with the tool's frontend using Next.js and Chakra UI. Worked with a DevOps team to ensure the tool was deployed and scaled effectively using AWS. Conducted extensive testing and debugging to ensure the tool's functionality and reliability. provide analysis functions such as long-term IP popularity analysis, market trends, expected sales, and localization through its own scoring service to help customers establish more efficient strategies.

projects.title: Beesokyeo
projects.description: A Chrome extension that purifies sentences containing user-specified words. developed Chrome extensions and fine tuned the GPT model. Won second place in a competition in which about 100 people participated.

projects.title: Submeet
projects.description: As a member of the web service team, developed and operated the 'Music NFT Sales' service. Developed an admin panel used for service operation. Integrate and debug blockchain code for NFT creation, sales, and management.

projects.title: DICS Students
projects.description: A site that manages disciplinary points for DICS school students. Building a disciplinary points check site for students and an admin site. Building a suggestion box system where students can suggest what they want. The site has been operational since its launch and has undergone maintenance.

projects.title: DICS Finterprint Attendance System
projects.description: Develop a fingerprint device utilizing a Raspberry Pi and a fingerprint sensor, and seamlessly integrate it with the school's student database to enhance attendance tracking efficiency, resulting in a significant reduction in tardiness by over 80%.

projects.title: DICS Computer Usage Record Sheet
projects.description: A program that efficiently manages the computer usage of DICS students. Built quickly using Supabase, an open-source version of Firebase, as the backend. A system is built to record and store the start and end times of students' computer usage.
